articles.title: 'Let's refuse to co-govern with criminals', says Cele at North West cops' funeral - News24
articles.description: Criminals in South Africa believed they have a right to cause mayhem and co-run the country, Police Minister Bheki Cele has said.
articles.content:
• Criminals should not be allowed to "co-govern" the country, Police Minister Bheki Cele has said.
  • Cele was speaking at the funeral of two officers burnt to death in North West.
